metadata.name: Dissolution
metadata.description:
Chapter 1: Dissolution

This night, just like last night and the night before, I found myself trapped inside this recurring vision. The moment of falling asleep completely dissolves and reality becomes a dream. Everything starts with the bright light lurking behind the closed doors, calling me silently. As I walk through the door the last traces of reality fades and I find myself in the vast plane of nothingness. Wandering forward, through seeming eternity, I encounter an ominous cloud that feels alive. There are three doors in front of it - to the past, the present and the future...

X

Video: Blender + Cycles / Adobe After Effects  
Audio: FL Studio
